title: Establish a Digital Operational Resilience Testing Programme
description: As a financial entity (excluding microenterprises), I need to establish, maintain, and review a sound and comprehensive digital operational resilience testing programme, as part of the ICT risk-management framework, to assess preparedness for handling ICT-related incidents, identify weaknesses, deficiencies, and gaps, and implement corrective measures promptly.

title: Incorporate Assessments and Tools into the Testing Programme
description: As a financial entity, I need to include a range of assessments, tests, methodologies, practices, and tools in the digital operational resilience testing programme, to ensure it meets the standards set out in Articles 25 and 26.

title: Follow a Risk-Based Approach for Testing
description: As a financial entity (excluding microenterprises), I need to follow a risk-based approach when conducting the digital operational resilience testing programme, considering the evolving ICT risk landscape, specific risks, criticality of information assets, services provided, and other relevant factors.

title: Ensure Independent Testing
description: As a financial entity (excluding microenterprises), I need to ensure that tests within the digital operational resilience testing programme are conducted by independent parties, either internal or external, with sufficient resources and conflict of interest avoidance measures in place.

title: Establish Procedures to Address Test Findings
description: As a financial entity (excluding microenterprises), I need to establish procedures and policies to prioritize, classify, and remedy issues revealed during testing, and to validate internally that all identified weaknesses, deficiencies, or gaps are fully addressed.

title: Conduct Annual Tests on ICT Systems
description: As a financial entity (excluding microenterprises), I need to ensure that appropriate tests are conducted at least yearly on all ICT systems and applications that support critical or important functions.
